verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ask in faith
The Name of Jesus
All your plea
Before the throne
As you trust
The Lord will whisper
See my child
The work is done

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ask in faith
God waits to answer
Each petition
Spirit wrought
He will work
In wondrous power
Far beyond
Your highest thought

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ask in faith
'tis just the asking
In a faith
That dares to stand
Full of joyful
Expectation with an open
Outstretched hand

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ask in faith
For God is waiting
For thy faith-filled
Earnest prayer
Faith delights Him
Faith can touch Him
Every moment
Everywhere
